ReleaseNotes.ReleaseNote:
This is the initial implementation/recreation! Does not include any in-game "sheds" or antennas (yet).
For reference, NDB classes:
- "Compass Locator" / COMPASS_POINT -- under 25 W, range under 15NM - MH -- under 50 W, range up to 25 NM - H -- from 50 W to 1,999 W, range up to 50 NM (varies by facility) - HH -- more than 2000 W, range up to 75 NM
It not added, default range is 27 NM.
Many of these are sourced from PilotNav. C.f. https://www.navcanada.ca/en/air-traffic/navaid-modernization-program.aspx
Cross reference DME channels here - https://www.icao.int/sites/default/files/sp-files/APAC/Documents/edocs/CNS/Frequency%20List%20No.%202%20-%2037th%20Edition%20-%20May%202024.pdf
Includes:
- 2K -- Camrose, AB + DME - 2S -- High Prairie, AB + DME - 3M -- Dryaton Valley Industrial, AB + DME - 3Z -- Taber, AB + DME - 4O -- Swan Hills, AB - 7D -- Hudson Bay, SK - 7J -- Forestburg, AB + DME - 7V -- Jasper-Hinton, AB - 8G -- Stettler, AB + DME - 8J -- Provost, AB + DME - 8M -- Elk Point, AB (DME only) - 8N -- Edson, AB + DME - 9X -- Brooks, AB + DME - C1 -- Airdrie, AB - D6 -- Fairmont Hot Springs, BC - K2 -- Olds-Didsbury, AB - OJ -- High Level, AB - PEC -- Jasper-Hinton, AB (DME only) - QL -- Lethbridge, AB - XH -- Medicine Hat, AB - YBW -- Calgary Springbank, AB (VOR/DME) - YC -- Calagary, AB - YOP -- Rainbow Lake, AB - ZCA -- Blackfoot (Calgary), AB - ZU -- Whitecourt, AB
